toc: true
toc-depth: 2

  pdf:
    execute:
      echo: false
      warning: false
    pdf-engine: "xelatex"

logofront: "`r certestyle::rmarkdown_logo('front')`"   # max 16x7 cm
logofooter: "`r certestyle::rmarkdown_logo('footer')`" # max 16x0.7 cm
editor: source
crossref:
  fig-prefix: "figuur"
  tbl-prefix: "tabel"
lang: "nl"
editor_options:
  chunk_output_type: console
